replies.body:
It should work, unless your password isn't good enough.
Try using a complicated password, something that would be hard to guess. Also, add some security questions if you want more security. ^-^

replies.body: Most likely, your minecraft account was hacked, since two people can't have the same username. One of the videos shows him dying, and it says that Noob830 fell out of the world. It's sad that this guy even posted videos made on a hacked account. As others suggested, if you haven't already, change your Minecraft password. It'll definitely help.
replies.body_tagged: Most likely, your minecraft account was hacked, since two people can't have the same username. One of the videos shows him dying, and it says that Noob830 fell out of the world. It's sad that this guy even posted videos made on a hacked account. As others suggested, if you haven't already, change your Minecraft password. It'll definitely help.

replies.body:
If you think or even have the notion that your Minecraft account was hacked, change your password immediately. 

It's a very simple process and will tighten your security.

If you ever need personal help with it, you can add me on Skype and I will try to aid you in the best possible way(on my profile).

Good luck.

Good luck.

confront them and let them know you are going to do whatever it takes to catch them and then - as Roman said - change your password, good luck man :)

EDIT: when i say confront, i mean go to the stolen channel and post, comment, etc. your confrontation :S
